
                            
                            <p>答案：ABB <br>  <a href="https://imes.mims.icbc.com.cn/ICBCESCommunityWEB/#/home?pageid=8dd6a309d6504b498c0a0d2377a738ac&amp;isWechat=1" target="_blank">https://imes.mims.icbc.com.cn/ICBCESCommunityWEB/#/home?pageid=8dd6a309d6504b498c0a0d2377a738ac&amp;isWechat=1</a> <br> 或者扫码<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/28/102428hqy9yi8bpzfp8jqi.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/28/102428hqy9yi8bpzfp8jqi.png"> </p>
